mapper.select: select * from community order by idx desc limit #{start}, #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (id, title, content, writedate, readnum, good, bad) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0, 0, 0)
INSERT INTO comment (idx, id, content, ref, lev, sunbun) VALUES (#{idx}, #{id}, #{content}, #{ref}, #{lev}, #{sunbun})
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET readnum = readnum + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
UPDATE community SET good = good + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
UPDATE community SET bad = bad + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
